snippet: From the high school baseball team to the George Washington Bridge, Chris Christie and David Wildstein span the years.
abstract: Maureen Dowd Op-Ed column skewers New Jersey Gov Chris Christie for dredging up high school behavior of former classmate and Port Authority official David Wildstein in attempt to disparage Wildstein and distance himself from George Washington Bridge scandal; deplores that New Jersey politics are not just like high school, but actually about high school.
lead_paragraph: From the high school baseball team to the George Washington Bridge, Chris Christie and David Wildstein span the years.

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
